title: Apply new logo asset and update site tagline

requirements.summary: Update centralized business tagline and ensure it renders in the header and Home hero.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts has siteContent.business.tagline set to exactly "Protecting Structures. Preserving Values." (including punctuation).
The header displays the updated tagline on desktop (where the tagline is currently shown).
The Home page hero displays the updated tagline.

file_operations.description: Update siteContent.business.tagline to exactly "Protecting Structures. Preserving Values." and keep it as the single source of truth for tagline text.

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded logo as a static asset and ensure the SiteHeader logo image loads reliably without triggering fallback.
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded logo image is added to the frontend static assets and is the image used by the header logo .
The SiteHeader logo image successfully loads (no broken image) and does not trigger the onError fallback in normal operation.
The logo remains crisp and properly contained within the existing header logo container at typical viewport sizes.

file_operations.description: Add the optimized square logo asset (from generated/business-logo.dim_512x512.png) into the public static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/business-logo.dim_512x512.png so it is available across local and deployed environments.

Ensure the header logo uses the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/business-logo.dim_512x512.png in a deployment-safe way (e.g., prefixing with the app base URL) so it loads reliably and does not trigger the onError fallback during normal operation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
